ThingDef.label: feathered wings
ThingDef.description: By creating wings that are powerful enough to keep the host aloft, but small enough to not intrude upon daily life, a way to rapidly increase the host speed was found.

ThingDef.label: musculature braces
ThingDef.description: Adding extra bands of muscle, as well as supporting bone to connect to, allows the host to hit harder and carry more.
